metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20838 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
libpcre in PCRE before 8.43 allows a subject buffer over-read in JIT when UTF is disabled, and \X or \R has more than one fixed quantifier, a related issue to CVE-2019-20454.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpcre16-3 - 2:8.39-13ubuntu0.21.10.1
libpcre3 - 2:8.39-13ubuntu0.21.10.1
libpcre32-3 - 2:8.39-13ubuntu0.21.10.1
libpcrecpp0v5 - 2:8.39-13ubuntu0.21.10.1
pcregrep - 2:8.39-13ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pcre3 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.39-13ubuntu0.21.10.1').
